title: Blue Nectar Assam Mogra Green Tea Loose leaf with Aniseed in Glass Jar(33 cups, 2.29 Oz)
features: AMRITANADI tea has GREEN TEA leaves and NOT Tea dust: Amritanadi Green tea leaves are full and complete that makes them of highest grade from Indian tea gardens
COMES in variety of FLAVORS: Comes in Variety of Flavors made from kitchen herbs/garden like Aniseed, Lemongrass or Rose
100% Natural FSSAI APPROVED Non GMO. Sourced from Himalayas. Freshly sealed and packed to maintain freshness
description: Refreshing cup of Assam Mogra Tea has Digestive Aniseed Aroma and taste that makes
consumption enjoyable and gives the feeling of connected-ness - AMRITANADI.
Aniseed is a known Indian Digestive consumed after sumptuous meal to get relief from bloated feeling. Potent combination of Aniseed and Green Tea makes it perfect way to end heartful meal.
Enjoy cup of Amritanadi green tea in morning and evening to for no other reason but simply because you want to drink green tea!

Whatever be the reason or occasion, AMRITANADI green tea only adds to pleasure and experience.  Green tea is next best to water. Brewed, unsweetened Green Tea being 99% water is a great way to meet your daily required fluid intake. It helps to give your skin a healthy glow.
Green tea is also rich in antioxidant activity and may help in cold and cough, supports healthy ageing and helps to uplift mood
To prepare best cup of green tea, add pinch of Green tea (2 gm) in cup. Top with hot boiling water and cover the cup for 1-2 min for tea to brew.
No need to strain green tea leaves
and your natural, refreshing cup of Green tea is ready to take you in different plain
